code: import{useState}from"react";import cl from"./ProductModal.module.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductModal=_ref=>{let{visible,setVisible,product}=_ref;const[isClosed,setIsClosed]=useState(false);const rootClasses=[cl.modal];const bodyClasses=[cl.modalBody];if(visible)rootClasses.push(cl.active);if(isClosed){rootClasses.push(cl.hiddenModal);bodyClasses.push(cl.hiddenBody);}const setModal=()=>{setIsClosed(true);setTimeout(()=>{setVisible(false);setIsClosed(false);},290);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:rootClasses.join(" "),onClick:setModal,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:bodyClasses.join(" "),onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:setModal,className:cl.exit,children:"\u2715"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(product.image,")")},className:cl.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cl.description,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:cl.title,children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:cl.quantity,children:product.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:cl.price,children:[product.price," \u0433\u0440\u043D"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:cl.info,children:product.description})]})]})});};export default ProductModal;
